txt.en: 'Rumours have reached me that Uruk-hai are riding around Thrymm's Farm as if it was their own. As a hero who helped to kill Núrzum, would you be willing to go and drive back his leaderless minions?\n\n'While they no longer have a giant to lend them strength, the Uruks are still bent on destroying all that they find.'
Dudoc can be found in Forlaw.\n\nYou should return to Dudoc.
Uruk-hai riders have been seen at Thrymm's Farm in the Fallows, leaderless without Núrzum, but nonetheless bent on wreaking destruction upon the lands of Wildermore.
'Are you ready to ride to Thrymm's Farm? The Uruk-hai await your vengeance!'\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>This is an instanced public questing area.</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000>Completing Wildermore's Recovery will cancel this quest.</rgb>
'Did you show the Uruks that the farmlands are not their stomping ground? Good! You are a great boon to the people of Wildermore.'
Defeat Uruk riders at Thrymm's Farm ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Thrymm's Farm can be reached by speaking with Dudoc to travel there.\n\nYou should travel to Thrymm's Farm and drive back the Uruks that now roam there freely.
